thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 22 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Balfour Beatty Says Selected By Wokingham To Deliver £124 Mln Major Highways Programme

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Balfour Beatty Says Selected By Wokingham To Deliver £124 Mln Major Highways Programme
text:
Jan 22 (Reuters) - Balfour Beatty Plc:
* HAS BEEN SELECTED BY WOKINGHAM BOROUGH COUNCIL TO DELIVER THEIR £124 MILLION MAJOR HIGHWAYS PROGRAMME
* WORKS ARE DUE TO COMMENCE THIS MONTH * ‍CONTRACT HAS BEEN AWARDED UNDER SCAPE GROUP‘S NATIONAL CIVIL ENGINEERING AND INFRASTRUCTURE FRAMEWORK​
* AT CONSTRUCTION PEAK PROGRAMME WILL EMPLOY OVER 150 INDIVIDUALS
* ‍FOUR-YEAR PACKAGE OF WORKS WILL INCLUDE PLANNING, DESIGN AND CONSTRUCTION OF NINE VITAL ROAD SCHEMES IN WOKINGHAM​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
